mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_log (log_uid, log_contents, log_date) VALUES (log_uid_seq.nextval, #{logContent}, #{nowDate})
mapper.select: SELECT pl.PC_UID "pcuid" ,pl.PL_PATH "path" FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM PICTURE WHERE PC_WRITE_DATE BETWEEN '${startDate}' AND '${endDate}' ORDER BY PC_HITS DESC) WHERE ROWNUM= 1) p JOIN PIC_LIB pl ON p.PC_UID = pl.PC_UID
SELECT pl.PC_UID ,pl.PL_PATH, pc_focus FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM PICTURE ORDER BY PC_HITS DESC) WHERE ROWNUM< 4) p JOIN PIC_LIB pl ON p.PC_UID = pl.PC_UID

SELECT J.*, P.FIRSTIMAGE2 FROM (SELECT H.tu_uid, H.tu_title, H.TU_HITS, D.place_uid FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM tour ORDER BY tu_hits DESC) WHERE ROWNUM < 4) H JOIN tour_location D ON H.tu_uid = D.tu_uid) J JOIN place P ON J.place_uid = P.place_uid
